description: This file defines a class DuckDbTools that provides various utility methods for interacting with a DuckDB database, including executing queries, managing tables, creating indexes, and performing full-text searches. It is part of a larger project involving database tools and utilities.

classes.name: DuckDbTools
classes.description: A utility class for managing and executing operations on a DuckDB database, including table management, query execution, index creation, and full-text search.

methods.name: connection
methods.description: Property that returns the DuckDB connection, establishing it if necessary.

methods.name: show_tables
methods.description: Displays the list of tables in the database if requested.

methods.name: describe_table
methods.description: Provides a description of a specified table.

methods.name: inspect_query
methods.description: Returns the query plan for a given SQL query.

methods.name: run_query
methods.description: Executes a SQL query and returns the result as a string.

methods.name: summarize_table
methods.description: Computes aggregate statistics over a table.

methods.name: get_table_name_from_path
methods.description: Derives a table name from a file path.

methods.name: create_table_from_path
methods.description: Creates a table in the database from a file path, supporting CSV and other formats.

methods.name: export_table_to_path
methods.description: Exports a table to a specified file path in a given format.

methods.name: load_local_path_to_table
methods.description: Loads a local file into a new table.

methods.name: load_local_csv_to_table
methods.description: Loads a local CSV file into a new table, with optional delimiter.

methods.name: load_s3_path_to_table
methods.description: Loads a file from an S3 path into a new table.

methods.name: load_s3_csv_to_table
methods.description: Loads a CSV file from an S3 path into a new table, with optional delimiter.

methods.name: create_fts_index
methods.description: Creates a full-text search index on a table.

methods.name: full_text_search
methods.description: Performs a full-text search on a table column.
